rows.label: tlk401007_msg0001
rows.name:
Problems at the summit?
A ridiculous notion!

rows.label: tlk401007_msg0002
rows.name:
The summit will be held aboard this
Divine Beast battleship, so we have no need
to fear attacks from the outside.

rows.label: tlk401007_msg0003
rows.name:
This door is the only entrance, and it
will not be opened until just before the
summit, to admit Queen Lagert.

rows.label: tlk401007_msg0004
rows.name:
We have not allowed a single suspicious
individual to pass this point.

rows.label: tlk401007_msg0005
rows.name:
As such, there is no need to fear
attack from within, either!
